Tears of death are among the most powerful of alchemical poisons, distilled from extracts of five other deadly poisons in just the right ratios. 

**Saving Throw** DC 44 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 10 minutes; Stage 1 20d6 poison damage and [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85) (1 round); **Stage 2** 22d6 poison damage and paralyzed (1 minute); **Stage 3** 24d6 poison damage and paralyzed (1 minute)
